content: Bank Account Asked by AnonymousAsked on 18 Dec 2018DBS multiplier vs OCBC 360 account? It has been noted that OCBC has revamped their account recently. Any advise whether I should switch over to 360 or stick to Multiplier?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Lok Yang TengLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 07 Jun 2019I think it'll be helpful if you can provide info on how much you spend, credit and invest with the particular bank (if applicable) to determine which account can provide higher interest rates. You can take a look at this article by Kenneth: https://blog.seedly.sg/best-savings-accounts-2018/2 comments1

Question Poster19 Dec 2018Hi, I think I can hit the salary credit, step-up and bonus categories. However, I think that the step-up & bonus % are not applicable for the entire sum in the account..Lok Yang Teng19 Dec 2018That's true, you can check their terms and conditions. The interest is only applicable for up to xx amount.
